title: The Lost Writer
description: Abandoned by his girlfriend, a struggling writer finds himself living out of his car. Desperate to recall the highlights of their relationship, he spends his last bit of money on a trip down memory lane. He visits their favorite bars and restaurants, reading from his notebooks to bring the past back to life. However, as his mind drifts to the early days of falling in love, his current situation takes an alarming turn.
author: Mark Kaijim
